name: Taking Care of My Robot
description:
Taking Care of My Robot

Your giant robot buddy takes care of an abandoned planet but can’t take care of themselves. Fly around and put them back together when they begin to fall apart.

Left Mouse Button = Add lift and Move Upwards
A/D = Move Left and Right
Hold Right Mouse Button = Grab debris with your claw

Also supports controllers:
A Button: Add lift and move upwards
Left stick: Move left and right
Triggers or bumpers: Grab with claw.

Art by Rachelle Viola (dr!p) 
Portfolio: rachelleviola.com
Twitter: @drOMGp

Programming by Jordan Ajlouni (robotAdventure)
Portfolio: JordanAjlouni.com
Twitter: @JordanAjlouni

Music by Auxcide
https://auxcide.bandcamp.com/
